attributes.action: ask the British public to read and consider the following texts and their bearing on ID card and surveillance legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The following texts should be mandatory reading for all British citizens and residents, particularly with the current trend towards greater monitoring and control of the populace:

Fahrenheit 451 - Ray Bradbury

The Pedestrian (Short Story) - Ray Bradbury

1984 - George Orwell

A Brave New World - Aldous Huxley

A quick search on these texts reveals that many are available for free in the public domain.
